task6.state

Class A_State

  • java.lang.Object
    • task6.state.A_State
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    A_StateBuildCoffeeBase, A_StateBuildCoffeeExtra, StateDeliverProduct, StateReturnChange, StateReturnRefund, StateStartTransaction

    public abstract class A_State
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the shared elements a state in the state machine representing the vending machine. Each of the do methods transitions to the next state as specified in the task description.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      A_State(Transaction transaction)
      Creates a state.
